# timelock-utils

## Commands

### Lock

```
$ ./timelock-utils --lock --data 050080890f --time 3600
{
  "chest": "",
  "key": ""
}
```

### Force

```
$ ./timelock-utils --force --time 3600 --chest 
050080890f
```

### Create chest key

```
./timelock-utils --create-chest-key --time 3600 --chest 

```

### Open

```
$ ./timelock-utils --open --time 3600 --chest  --key 
050080890f
```
